_source.short_desc: A full fledged alumni management solution (SAAS) for educational institutions & corporates to build their exclusive alumni networks.
_source.long_desc:
Helps educational institutions in managing alumni database and improving alumni engagement with 450+ clients across 20 regions including India, Australia, Europe, Malaysia, Indonesia, Middle East, Africa, Japan, Philippines, USA, West Indies.

Helps Corporates to stay connected with former staff, enhancing employer branding, re-hiring and referrals, One-stop Exits Helpdesk for all the alumni queries trusted by Corporates like Qualcomm, TataSteel, RBEI, organizations like United Nations GESCI.
_source.target_audience:
Educational Institutions including Schools, Colleges, Universities & Alumni Associations, 
SMB to Enterprise Corporates, Professional training and organizations with alumni needs.

related_products.short_desc: Manage memberships & waivers, get booked 24/7, seamlessly process payments, send marketing emails & run reports. Starts at $25/month.
related_products.features: Use our all-in-one membership management software & app to manage and grow your business. Get booked & paid 24/7. Stay safe with 100% contactless check-in & checkout. Advertise your virtual and in-person classes on the Vagaro Marketplace. Reduce no-shows with automated reminders. Manage classes and memberships on any device. Send waivers and forms. Vagaro Pro is the most downloaded/reviewed Apple & Android App. Prices start @ $25/month. Sign up for a Free 1 Month Trial.

related_products.short_desc: Squarespace is the all-in-one platform to build a beautiful website, online store, or portfolio.
related_products.features: Squarespace is the all-in-one platform to build a beautiful online presence. Look like an expert right from the start with award-winning templates for your website, online store, or portfolio. Customize the design to fit your personal style and professional needs. Get found in search by more people with powerful SEO tools. Learn where your website traffic is coming from, what your visitors are looking for, and how they're interacting with your content or products with in-depth Analytics tools.

related_products.short_desc: Mindbody wellness business management software is tailored to businesses that need business and membership management systems.
related_products.features: Mindbody empowers your members to own their wellness experience. From member profiles and automated reminders to self check-in, your all-in-one software will keep everyone moving. Plus, with a custom app, members can update their info and schedule on the go?from the comfort of your brand. Manage and grow your community with ease. Schedule your free demo today.

related_products.short_desc: Affordable, All-In-One Solution to streamline website management,  membership dues, email marketing and more. Try a Demo!
related_products.features:
---- TRY OUR 7-DAY FREE TRIAL:
https://www.brilliantdirectories.com/trial  ----

Brilliant Directories offers an Affordable, All-In-One Member Management Solution to streamline all aspects of your membership website or association.  A complete, turn-key solution with quick setup and free, unlimited support from real people. Includes website design, online payment processing, multi-level memberships, past due monitoring, premium member's only content, and more.

related_products.short_desc: Track donors, donations and pledges for your church.  Accept online donations (integrated with most online giving providers).
related_products.features: "Save time and get more done, with fewer headaches." Easily keep track of your members, dues, contributions, pledges and more... Starts at $47.98 (one-time cost, no monthly fees; no attendance tracking, accounting or payroll) Print or email yearly tax receipts and quarterly statements. Print membership photo directory.  Share data like web-based software without the monthly fee, using DropBox or Google Drive.  Exports data to QuickBooks.  PC or Mac.

related_products.short_desc: Membership Management Software for board volunteers who want to grow their membership while saving time!
related_products.features: Want to grow your membership? Let StarChapter manage your membership data and increase retention rates so, you have more time for outreach. The software combines emails, event registration, membership, website design, and payment processing. Our StarChapter Project Manager will set up your service with you, coordinate the project for you, and train users even when the board transitions. Get access to 24/7 online technical support and industry resources.

related_products.short_desc: Easily manage your members, process payments, send out emails, register event attendees, create a website and more.
related_products.features: WildApricot is a complete membership management system, designed to fit your organizations needs. Easily manage your contacts, process payments, send out emails, register event attendees, create a website and more. With a self serve design and a user friendly interface, you have the freedom to customize every aspect of your membership management system. If you need help at any step of the way, our support team and community of experts are ready to help guide you and share their best practices.

related_products.short_desc: Increase engagement & revenue with a sophisticated membership management solution designed to support both nonprofits & associations.
related_products.features:
Increase engagement & drive more revenue with Neon CRM, a sophisticated membership management solution designed to support both nonprofits and associations.

Build better relationships with event and experience management, activity tracking, marketing tools, and more!

Put your members in control with a member log-in portal to check their membership status, a custom member directory, and exclusive content. 

Ready for a more intuitive approach to member management?

related_products.short_desc: The complete front office and back office for your club or association: website, member database, events, forums, and much more.
related_products.features: ClubExpress is the economical Internet-based solution for smaller professional and trade associations (25-5000 members). ClubExpress combines your association web site with the membership database, online member signups/renewals/expirations, event calendar & registration, credit-card processing, membership directory, committees, forums, documents, interests, benefits, etc. We use state-of-the-art security, there's no advertising and associations own their data at all times.

related_products.short_desc: Simplify membership management with MemberClicks; the all-in-one solution for staff who need to save time and grow their membership.
related_products.features: MemberClicks has everything you need to save time and grow your membership. Automate essential tasks, such as finances, membership management, and events. Engage members with email nurturing, online learning, job postings, and more. Today, over 3,000 clients across North America trust MemberClicks to fulfill their missions.

related_products.short_desc: Online booking, resource scheduling, lead generation, and reporting solution for every business.
related_products.features: An all-in-one solution for your business! We feature a sophisticated scheduler for all your appointments and classes, email marketing, merchant processing, payroll, reputation management, robust reporting, a rewards program, and many more features. There are no pricey add-on fees to embed your schedule into your site, generate reviews, send emails/SMS notifications, rewards program, marketing automations, or anything else. WellnessLiving was built by our customers, for our customers!

similar_products.short_desc: Retain, engage, and grow your member community with a software that automates your membership processes and maximizes retention.
similar_products.features: Perfect for Associations, Chambers of Commerce and business networks worldwide. Glue Up (formerly EventBank) is an all-in-one cloud software that integrates a world class CRM to the best membership and event management, email marketing, and finance tools. Unlock new paths for growth and collect membership dues with a platform that consolidates all of your operations in one place. The platform comes with 2 mobile apps: one for you to manage your organization, and one for your community.

similar_products.short_desc: Easily manage your members, process payments, send out emails, register event attendees, create a website and more.
similar_products.features: WildApricot is a complete membership management system, designed to fit your organizations needs. Easily manage your contacts, process payments, send out emails, register event attendees, create a website and more. With a self serve design and a user friendly interface, you have the freedom to customize every aspect of your membership management system. If you need help at any step of the way, our support team and community of experts are ready to help guide you and share their best practices.

similar_products.short_desc: Stop juggling multiple software - Simplify your membership management system with Member365.
similar_products.features:
Member365 combines the functionality of your email campaign manager, financial software, and CRM to create a platform custom-made for Membership Managers.

Automate busy work to spend less time managing member data, and more time understanding member needs. Create email campaigns in seconds by building lists from your Member365 CRM. Understand who is likely to churn, and more, with Engagement Analytics.

With Member365, your work is about managing members, not just their data.

similar_products.short_desc: Unlock the potential of your community with the most flexible and powerful all-in-one solution for community management and engagement.
similar_products.features: Unlock the potential of your community with Hivebrite, the most advanced all-in-one community management and engagement platform. Easy to set up and fully branded to match your colors, Hivebrite helps you build brand engagement and create opportunities for your private community. Manage your member database, centralize the communication with your members, create events and collect online memberships, all from a single user-friendly interface.

similar_products.short_desc: Simplify membership management with MemberClicks; the all-in-one solution for staff who need to save time and grow their membership.
similar_products.features: MemberClicks has everything you need to save time and grow your membership. Automate essential tasks, such as finances, membership management, and events. Engage members with email nurturing, online learning, job postings, and more. Today, over 3,000 clients across North America trust MemberClicks to fulfill their missions.

similar_products.short_desc: YourMembership is an affordable, all-in-one member management software built for small to mid-sized associations and nonprofits.
similar_products.features: YourMembership empowers associations, nonprofits and other member-based organizations to deliver more value to their members while streamlining administrative processes. Built for small to mid-sized organizations, the cloud-based membership management software is a comprehensive solution including: membership management, event management, e-Commerce, payments, email marketing, online community, advanced dashboards, and more!

similar_products.short_desc: SaaS solution that provides an organization with a member database, website content tools, online event registration, and much more!
similar_products.features: Our affordable and easy to use software can streamline your member-based organization's administrative processes; retain and grow your membership; and generate revenue. Our intuitive association management features can help you track dues; communicate and engage with members and prospects; update your website; host in-person events and virtual events with our Zoom interface; conduct calls for proposals; track donations; integrate with QuickBooks; manage committees; and more. Try a free demo!

similar_products.short_desc: Gym membership management software with payment processing, Integrated Websites, virtual training, scheduling, automation & more.
similar_products.features: Our comprehensive, membership management software provides everything you need to turn your passion into a successful business. With payment processing & auto-billing, lead-generating websites + digital marketing, virtual classes, scheduling, retail, automation, member & staff apps, in-depth reporting & more, you have everything required to grow, nurture & retain your members.

similar_products.short_desc: Used by organizations to manage their memberships, integrate their other SaaS platforms, & automate their critical tasks.
similar_products.features: Join It is a membership management service that enables organizations to effectively keep track, manage, and grow their community. At our core, we provide a simple database and dashboard interface for organization leaders to monitor developments in their membership. We then integrate this database context with best in class service providers to automate other essential components of an organization, like payment processing, email communication, and event organization.

similar_products.short_desc: Mindbody wellness business management software is tailored to businesses that need business and membership management systems.

From member profiles and automated reminders to self check-in, your all-in-one software will keep everyone moving. Plus, with a custom app, members can update their info and schedule on the go?from the comfort of your brand. Manage and grow your community with ease. Schedule your free demo today.

similar_products.short_desc: SmartRec by Amilia is the smartest and easiest way to offer, manage, and sell activities. Engage communities online effortlessly.
similar_products.features:
Amilia SmartRec empowers businesses, community organizations and Parks & Recreation agencies to better serve their community with activities.  

We make it easy for your community to find, register and pay for activities online. You'll save time and get to do more of what you love - it's eCommerce for activities!  

When your registration process is simple and effortlessly accessed by your community, you'll generate even more engagement. Not to mention, you'll see a huge bump in signups.

similar_products.short_desc: Our gym and fitness studio membership management system is the all-in-1 place to manage your daily admin tasks & increase revenue.
similar_products.features: Our gym and fitness studio membership management software gives you an all-in-1 place to manage your daily admin tasks & increase revenue. Enhance your member's experience with a mobile app they can use to book classes, make purchases and engage with your studio. With our website schedule integrations, make sure your members can easily find and view your class schedule. We also provide a check-in kiosk which will free up time before a class for you to engage with your members and prospects.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Association Management software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Association Management tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Association Management software automates management functions including fundraising, membership, event management and other operations. These software packages typically offer many features to empower and inform association members, as well as administration and business process tools for association managers. Associations use these applications to communicate with their constituents, share resources, promote events, collect fees and recruit new members. Association Management software is related to Membership Management software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Church Management software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Church Management tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Church Management software handles functions such as accounting, donation tracking, service attendance, membership, schedules and activities. Churches use these applications to automate and organize administrative functions including document creation, outreach and event scheduling. Management software helps churches better track resources and foster communication among administrators as well as staff, ministry leaders, members and visitors. Church Management software is related to Fund Accounting software, Fundraising software and Membership Management software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Club Management software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Club Management tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Club Management software automates management functions including membership, fees, dues and other operations for fitness, social and civic clubs or other similar organizations. These applications offer integrated solutions for access management as well as sales and marketing tools for club facilities. Club Management solutions also help track business performances through automated reporting and forecasting on sales performance, member retention rates and revenue generation. Club Management software is related to Membership Management software, Visitor Management software, and Registration software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Directory software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Directory tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Directory software is used to create product and services classifieds, informational portals and membership lists with or without monetization options.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Fundraising software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Fundraising tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Fundraising software manages donor and pledge information associated with fundraising campaigns. Development professionals use Fundraising applications to enhance their ability to locate, manage and grow donor sources. Fundraising software facilitates cost effective targeting of likely donors, tracks pledges, and manages contributions and donor relationship management. These applications also provide a variety of tools allowing fundraisers to track the effectiveness of their development campaigns. Fundraising software is related to Church Management software, Event Management software and Political Campaign software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Nonprofit software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Nonprofit tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Nonprofit software automates all aspects of nonprofit operations from database management, to fundraising, to accounting and CRM. Nonprofit software is related to Donation Management software and Nonprofit Accounting software.
